title: Repairing Our Hearts - Healing with the RAIN of Compassion (2020-12-30)
itunes:title: Repairing Our Hearts - Healing with the RAIN of Compassion
description: Repairing Our Hearts - Healing with the RAIN of Compassion (2020-12-30) - Living in a fear-based society fuels the trance of separation and unworthiness. This talk explores how we can bring an engaged compassionate presence to the suffering of this trance—in our inner work, and more broadly, in healing our culture (from the IMCW 2020 New Year Silent Retreat).
